__e: Well, Morgan called me and said there'd been a terrible accident at the base... and that I should come straight out here and drop-- well, whatever it was I was doing.
I told you to hurry and give it to me...
Though you'll probably have to down it quickly. Because the police will be here in three minutes.
It's three blocks away. And sometimes the bus comes at 8:08, so I have to rush to catch it.
Oui il faut travailler et se dépécher pour finir le travail à temps
You can absolutely have a lawyer, Serena, and I will hurry to make that happen, but before we go there, I just want you to know:
I told him to hurry up and jump me...
I wanted to rush off and get married because I just thought that I might be gay.
Well, you mustn't be in too much of a rush and you must do what I say.
